Description: Fragment of oval handle at neck join of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine red-buff. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Ink, reading of text.. Name Aristeidas. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0068.29.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (60)
